description: This is an Alembic environment script used for database migrations in a Python project. It configures migration context, manages online and offline migration modes, and interacts with SQLAlchemy models and settings.

methods.name: get_url
methods.description: Returns the database URL from environment variable or application settings.

methods.name: run_migrations_offline
methods.description: Configures and runs database migrations in offline mode.

methods.name: run_migrations_online
methods.description: Configures and runs database migrations in online mode, using the application's engine.
